taxpayer_name.description: Extract the primary taxpayer's full name or business entity name

tax_jurisdiction.description: The governmental authority responsible for the tax

tax_type.description: The type of tax (e.g., income, sales, property, etc.)

tax_period.description: The time period covered by the tax notice (e.g., Q1 2025, Jan-Mar 2025)

amount_due.description: The total amount due according to the tax notice

due_date.description: The date by which payment must be made
